text: Dr Lisa Cameron is a Scottish politician. She is currently sitting in the House of Commons as MP for the East Kilbride, Strathaven and Lesmahagow seat, which she has held since 2015. She is married to Mark Horsham, who sits as a Councillor in her constituency. Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the British House of Commons for Scottish constituencies Category:Scottish National Party MPs
title: Lisa Cameron
